Text: Costanzo is an Italian given name, translated from the Latin name Constantius.
Triplets:<Costanzo
1:
--------------------
Text: Costanzo:  It is also used as an, originally patronymic, surname.
Triplets:<Costanzo
2:
--------------------
<Text: Costanzo:  As a surname, it may be preceded by di or Di (meaning "of"), with or without space.>
